message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but given its importance to you, I believe it's a perfect match for your needs. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $12,000. This amount reflects its true worth while allowing us to come to an agreeable transaction. I understand that such a decision requires careful consideration, and I assure you that the quality and benefits of this product are unparalleled. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.
